# Yusuf Mohammad Jojeh - Full-Stack & AI Engineer Portfolio

> Developer Portfolio - AI-powered business solutions and enterprise applications

## About

Yusuf Mohammad Jojeh is a Full-Stack Developer and AI Systems Engineer specializing in React, Next.js, NestJS, Laravel, and AI-powered business solutions. Based in Aleppo, Syria, with 3+ years of professional experience and open to remote work or relocation.

## Core Expertise

### AI & Automation
- **Prompt Engineering**: Expert-level optimization for ChatGPT, Claude, and custom AI agents
- **AI Integration**: ChatGPT API, Claude API, voice recognition, natural language processing
- **AI Automation**: Workflow automation, intelligent data processing, AI-powered features

### Backend Development
- **Frameworks**: Laravel (PHP), NestJS (Node.js/TypeScript), Python Flask
- **APIs**: RESTful APIs, GraphQL, WebSocket real-time communication
- **Architecture**: Microservices, event-driven architecture, clean code principles

### Frontend Development
- **Modern Stack**: React 19, Next.js 16, TypeScript, Tailwind CSS
- **Animations**: Framer Motion, Three.js for 3D graphics
- **Performance**: SSR, SSG, code splitting, lazy loading, Core Web Vitals optimization

### DevOps & Tools
- **Containerization**: Docker, Docker Compose
- **CI/CD**: GitHub Actions, automated testing pipelines
- **Version Control**: Git, GitHub collaborative workflows

### Databases
- **SQL**: MySQL, PostgreSQL - complex queries, indexing, optimization
- **NoSQL**: MongoDB - document storage, aggregation pipelines
- **Design**: Database schema design, normalization, performance tuning

## Flagship Projects

### 1. AI Business Platform (Enterprise SaaS)
**Stack**: NestJS + Next.js + PostgreSQL + Redis
**AI Integration**: ChatGPT API for intelligent automation
**Features**:
- AI-powered document generation and analysis
- Real-time collaboration with WebSocket
- Role-based access control (RBAC)
- RESTful API with comprehensive documentation
- Docker containerization for deployment

**Key Technologies**: TypeScript, JWT authentication, Redis caching, PostgreSQL optimization

### 2. Medical Mini AI Agent
**Stack**: Laravel + React + Python Flask + MySQL
**AI Integration**: Claude API + Voice Recognition
**Features**:
- AI-powered medical consultation assistant
- Arabic voice recognition with high accuracy
- Intelligent symptom analysis and recommendations
- Secure patient data management
- Real-time doctor notifications

**Key Technologies**: Python NLP, voice processing, HIPAA-compliant security

### 3. CRM & Business Management System
**Stack**: Laravel + React + MySQL
**Features**:
- Complete customer relationship management
- Sales pipeline tracking and analytics
- Automated email campaigns
- Invoice generation and financial reporting
- Multi-tenant architecture

**Key Technologies**: Laravel Queues, event broadcasting, scheduled jobs

## Technical Skills

**Languages**: PHP, JavaScript, TypeScript, Python, SQL, HTML5, CSS3
**Frameworks**: Laravel, NestJS, React, Next.js, Tailwind CSS, Flask
**AI Tools**: ChatGPT API, Claude API, Prompt Engineering, RAG systems
**DevOps**: Docker, GitHub Actions, Linux server management
**Testing**: PHPUnit, Jest, Playwright, integration testing
**Tools**: Git, Postman, VS Code, Cursor AI, Docker Desktop

## Portfolio Website

This portfolio is built with Next.js 16 (App Router), showcasing:
- **SEO Optimization**: Full metadata, Schema.org structured data
- **Internationalization**: English and Arabic (RTL support)
- **Modern Design**: Three.js space background, Framer Motion animations
- **Performance**: Static generation, optimized Core Web Vitals
- **Accessibility**: WCAG 2.1 compliant

## Key Differentiators

1. **AI-First Approach**: Deep expertise in prompt engineering and AI integration
2. **Fast Iteration**: Using AI tools (Cursor, Claude) for rapid, high-quality development
3. **Enterprise Experience**: Built scalable systems handling thousands of users
4. **Bilingual Developer**: Native Arabic, professional English
5. **Full-Stack Depth**: Equally strong in backend, frontend, and DevOps
